title: Which is the latest trending Hindi rap song (underground) in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: In underground scene rap song maharani by kr$na is on trending this is a diss track against underground rapper muhfaad it was realease on 29th Jan 2020 in this song kr$na diss muhfaad and when this song come out it gain 1 million views in just 1 week without any promotion we can also say that this song can destroyed the half carrier of muhfaad people also loving this song now in this whole scene muhfaad is also thinking for a diss track against kr$na it is an interesting conflict between muhfaad and kr$na where all people are loving this scene this is also very good if you love diss track s than you must listen that song

2020 could be the year where underground industry take a huge step forward in the right direction. when Underground rappers get the fame. check out this channel this guy produces some insane beats with some real killer lyrics.
